meanings.definition: On the side of a ship that is sheltered from the wind.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered on the alee side of the ship to avoid the strong wind.
meanings.sent2: The passengers enjoyed the calm seas on the alee side of the ship.
meanings.sent3: The alee side of the ship was like a cozy nook away from the blustery wind.
meanings.sent4: The alee side of the ship was a peaceful sanctuary amidst the turbulent waves.
meanings.sent5: The alee side of the ship provided a tranquil retreat from the howling wind.
